reviewText: My son started watching this since he was 6 months old and he loves it. This is one of the best Farsi educational videos I have found for my child. I wish there were more like it but unfortunately there aren't. I also have the color one but please make more!!!!

Enjoyed this DVD very much with my family - good for smaller children learning farsi for sure! I also recommend (for slightly older age group) to buy this great Norooz DVD for Persian Culture and general fun - good for all audiences A First Norooz (Babak & Friends)
My 3 years old daughter loves this DVD - does get tired of it -has learned the songs, etc.  we play it 1-2 times a month and its always fun - it reflects the Persian culture ... very well made.

I got this because its the only Childrens Farsi Dvd I could find. It was done pretty well, but some of the images are pretty boring. Pointing to body parts and saying the names for example. This could have been made more interesting with a song. However there are some great puppets, especially the one that sneezes, there are also plenty of things to keep my 9 month engaged.
I've bought almost everything in my quest to learn Persian.... this dvd is very basic and very short... other dvds are better

A charming production of characters, colors, and music with the latest animation techniques bring to life a powerful message of family unity and respect.  I highly recommend the trailers (in both languages) to the parents.  Well done.
